name: Plane boy
description:
Game introduction

Control a dazzling fighter to fight the enemy in the air. Click the left mouse button to attack, and click the right mouse button to switch the bullet type. There are two types of attacks. Gatling missiles have a wide range and strong power.
The game simulates the real air combat scene, which has strong operability. When the aircraft turns, it will not turn directly, but has a certain inertia in it. During the battle, you need to control the aircraft to avoid the enemy's fire and look for opportunities to counterattack! On the enemy's side, there are not only fighter planes, but also artillery bases on the ground
